thread.title: Goring to pay tribute to George Michael with memorial
thread.title_full: Goring to pay tribute to George Michael with memorial | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Goring to pay tribute to George Michael with memorial
text:
George Michael was found dead at his Goring-on-Thames home on Christmas Day. Fans are continuing to leave flowers and messages as a mark of respect.
Tonight, the parish council in Goring will consider plans for a permanent memorial in Goring and Sangeeta spoke to Kevin Bulmer who is chair of Goring Parish Council.
Play video Last updated Mon 13 Feb 2017
